input: What are the current GST rates in India?
output:
GST rates in India are structured as follows:
• 0% - Essential items like milk, bread, vegetables, books
• 5% - Basic necessities like sugar, tea, coffee, edible oil
• 12% - Standard goods like computers, processed food
• 18% - Most goods and services including soaps, IT services
• 28% - Luxury items like cars, tobacco, aerated drinks

Special rates include 0.25% for rough precious stones and 3% for gold, silver, platinum.
